alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 12:36PM EST until January 16 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation changing to snow before tapering off. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Delaware, New Castle. In New Jersey, Salem, Gloucester, Camden and Northwestern Burlington. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
